data.Name: Emily Rubin
data.staff_ed:
B.A. Cornell University
M.A. University of New Hampshire
General Course Degree, London School of Economics and Political Science
data.staff_pubs: Voices of the Future: Emerging Leaders, University of Massachusetts, Boston, MA. July 2009 (Contributing writer). As I Am Presently Known, Plain View Press, Austin, TX. June 2009. “Dreamoirs” by Marian Marzynski. Boston Review, Cambridge, MA. Summer 2005 (Editor). “Days of Awe” in New York Stories, LaGuardia CUNY, Long Island City, NY. Summer 2004. Job Development Essentials: A Guide for Job Developers, Philadelphia: Public/Private Ventures, 2001 (Contributing writer). Workplus: Developing Skills for Young Entry Level Workers, Philadelphia: Public/Private Ventures, 1999 (Contributing writer). “Are You Computer Illiterate?” in Jobs, The Boston Globe, January 8, 1999. Practices in Work-Based Learning for the State of New Hampshire, Philadelphia: Public/Private Ventures, 1997 (Contributing writer).
